description: Employment and Social Development Canada have a requirement to purchase three (3) types of clear low-density polyethylene plastic bags to be used by Passport Agents in the Passport Processing Center.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement: Polyethylene Plastic Bags**
==========================================================

**Procurement Reference:** WS3595957769-Doc3646285056

**Tender Description:**
_Employment and Social Development Canada has a requirement to purchase three (3) types of clear low-density polyethylene plastic bags to be used by Passport Agents in the Passport Processing Center._

**Bid Requirements:**
This requirement is for an initial period of three (3) years from the effective date of the Standing Offer, with an option to extend the offer by two (2) additional periods of one (1) year.

**Bid Submission and Evaluation Criteria:**
To be considered, all required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received on February 9, 2023, by 1400 EST. Offers submitted after 1400 EST will be declared non-responsive. The selection criterion is **Lowest Price**.

**Trade Agreements:**
This bid is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Contracting Entity Information:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
sherline.pieris@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14566262?extsite=MTQ1NjYyNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note that I've shortened the content while keeping the most important information. If you require more, please let me know. Good luck with your technical writing gig!
